      • form_service_name

        public static java.lang.String form_service_name(java.lang.String host,
                                 java.lang.String container,
                                 java.lang.String engine_name)
                                          throws CException
        Constructs and returns CLARA specified canonical name. For e.g. service name convention, i.e. host:container:engine
        Parameters:
        host - DPE host IP address
        container - Clara service container name
        engine_name - Clara service engine name
        Returns:
        canonical name of the Clara service
        Throws:
        CException

        public static java.lang.Boolean isRemoteService(java.lang.String s_name)
                                         throws CException
        Checks to see if the service is locally deployed
        Parameters:
        s_name - service canonical name (dpe-ip:container:engine)
        Returns:
        true/false
        Throws:
        CException

      • engineToCanonical

        public static java.lang.String engineToCanonical(java.lang.String dpe,
                                 java.lang.String container,
                                 java.lang.String composition)
                                          throws CException

        Parses the specified composition and replaces the engine names with a proper service canonical names, using specified dpe and container names. Note: This method assumes that all engines specified in the composition are deployed on a same dpe and the same container

        Parameters:
        dpe - dpe canonical name (IP address of the host where DPE is deployed)
        container - the name of the container
        composition - Clara composition string (non canonical)
        Returns:
        canonical name of the application composition
        Throws:
        CException
